name: Dropstone
description: The Recursive Swarm IDE that orchestrates 10,000 AI agents in a single development tab. Represents a paradigm shift from chatbot-based interfaces to swarm orchestration for AI-assisted development.
community_quotes: The end of the chatbot era
Stop chatting, start orchestrating
10,000 agent swarm in one IDE

name: Giselle
description: Open-source AI workflow builder with visual node editor for designing and running complex AI-powered tasks. Built with Next.js 16, Turborepo, and Vercel AI SDK. GitHub-native with zero infrastructure setup required.
community_quotes: Open source and built around real workflows
Lets you design agents with a visual node editor
Zero infrastructure setup - just build and run

name: Plannotator
description: Interactive plan review plugin for Claude Code that enables annotation, review, and sharing of coding plans. Integrates via Claude Code hooks to help manage complex multi-step development plans with team collaboration.
community_quotes: Interactive plan mode for Claude Code
Stop Claude Code from forgetting everything
Review, annotate and share plans with teammates

name: Gitdocs
description: AI-powered tool that generates production-ready README files from GitHub repositories. Uses agentic workflow to analyze repos and create clean, structured documentation with near-zero effort.
community_quotes: Generate production-ready README files from your GitHub repo
Make your repository explain itself
Agentic workflow that deeply analyzes your repository

name: Alpie Core
description: A 32B 4-bit reasoning model that delivers frontier-level performance with improved efficiency. Achieved #4 ranking and 183 upvotes on Product Hunt launch day.
community_quotes: 4-bit reasoning model with frontier-level performance
32B model trained and fine-tuned
Efficient yet high-performing reasoning model

name: CTO Bench
description: Ground truth code agent benchmark that measures real-world performance based on merged code as percentage of completed tasks. Reports 4-day rolling success rate to evaluate actual coding agent effectiveness rather than artificial benchmarks.
community_quotes: The ground truth code agent benchmark
Measures merged code percentage of completed tasks
Real-world tasks not hypothetical scenarios

name: wafer
description: GPU development stack that lives inside your IDE, providing profiling, compiler explorer, and GPU docs in one place. Integrates GPU tooling directly into the editor to solve context switching in GPU programming.
community_quotes: A definite must-have for custom kernels developers
Solving the Context Switching Tax which is particularly brutal in GPU programming
